title: 3.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Make conflicting changes to the same program file with the help of your teammates. Each of you should attempt to merge your changes into the main branch, resulting in a merge conflict. Try to resolve the merge conflict and successfully merge their changes.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
